target.name: build
target.description: Builds all extensions

target.name: deploy
target.description: Deploys platform to bundled server. Will copy files of config/tomcat or config/tcServer to config folder of configured bundled server.

target.name: ear
target.description: Builds ear file

echo.message: creating ear using glassfish ear format

target.name: all
target.description: executes ant build and ant server

target.name: clean
target.description: Cleans platform and all extensions

target.name: cleanear
target.description: Cleans ear file

target.name: dist
target.description: Creates a distribution

target.name: pmd
target.description: Tests the source code with the pmd rules.

target.name: sonar
target.description: Executes sonar to check all projects with the sonar rules.

target.name: sonarsingle
target.description: Executes sonar to check a single project with the sonar rules.

target.name: classpathgen
target.description: Creates a standard platform .classpath file

target.name: sourcezip
target.description: Creates a sourcezip

target.name: extgen
target.description: Runs extgen

target.name: modulegen
target.description: Runs modulegen

target.name: initialize
target.description: Runs an initialization of the specified tenant in stand-alone mode, using hybris Administration Console default settings. Syntax: ant initialize [-Dtenant=tenantID -DdryRun=true|false -DtypeSystemOnly=true|false]

target.name: initializetenantdb
target.description: Runs an initialization of the specified tenant database tables without building or restarting server

target.name: droptypesystem
target.description: Drops type system tables.

target.name: createtypesystem
target.description: Creates type system tables.

target.name: server
target.description: Configures hybris Server and restart if running

target.name: updatesystem
target.description: Runs an update system of the specified tenant in stand-alone mode, using hybris Administration Console default settings or the configuration from a given file. Syntax: ant updatesystem [-Dtenant=tenantID -DdryRun=true|false -DtypeSystemOnly=true|false -DconfigFile=PATH_TO_CONFIG_FILE]

target.name: executeScript
target.description: Executes script from file. Syntax: ant executeScript -Dresource=scriptURI [-Dparams="key1=value1,key2=value2"] (example ant executeScript -Dresource=file:///path/to/script.groovy)

target.name: importImpex
target.description: Import ImpEx from file. Syntax: ant importImpex -Dresource=/full/path/to/import.impex

target.name: clearOrphanedTypes
target.description: Clears orphaned types after system update. Syntax: ant clearOrphanedTypes [-DclearInstances=true/false -DclearDeployments=true/false]. Default value for clearInstances is true, default value for clearDeployments is true

target.name: sanitycheck
target.description: Executes sanity check (db health check, license check, etc...) on current platform

target.name: copyFromTemplate
target.description: Creates directory based on provided template directory and substitutes all variables defined in .tmpl files with provided parameters. -DtemplateDir - (required) path to template directory -DoutputDir - (required) path to output directory -DfilesToCopy - (optional) coma separated list of files/directories that will be additionally copied -Dproperties - (optional) properties file that overrides default template properties

target.name: createPlatformImageStructure
target.description: Creates platform docker image structure

target.name: webservice_nature
target.description: Provides webservice nature to selected extension

target.name: yunitinit
target.description: Initializes JUnit tenant

target.name: yunitupdate
target.description: Update JUnit tenant

target.name: apidoc
target.description: build javadoc for all current extensions

target.name: unittests
target.description: executes all unittests

target.name: demotests
target.description: executes all demotests

target.name: integrationtests
target.description: executes all integrationtests

target.name: manualtests
target.description: executes all manualtests

target.name: bugprooftests
target.description: executes all bugprooftests

target.name: localizationtest
target.description: executes the localizationtest to see if all types are properly localized

target.name: typecodetest
target.description: executes the typecodetest to see if any reserved typecodes are being used

target.name: alltests
target.description: executes all tests except manualtests and performancetests (allowed parameters: -Dtestclasses.extensions -Dtestclasses.annotations -Dtestclasses.packages -Dtestclasses.packages.excluded)

target.name: codequality
target.description: executes all codequality tests

target.name: updateMavenDependencies
target.description: Updates all maven dependencies in all extensions

target.name: cleanMavenDependencies
target.description: Deletes all maven dependencies in all extensions

target.name: testMavenDependencies
target.description: Test all maven dependencies in platform and all extensions

target.name: extensionsxml
target.description: Generates complete extensions.xml file config/generatedextensions.xml based on current settings of localextensions.xml

target.name: localproperties
target.description: Appends properties to local.properties

target.name: generateLicenseOverview
target.description: Downloads all third party licenses and generates an overview file

target.name: customize
target.description: Copies all files from '/config/customize' folder to '/bin' folder recursively

target.name: production
target.description: Creates production environment zip's for hybris Server

target.name: runcronjob
target.description: Performs a cronjob in stand-alone mode. Syntax: ant runcronjob [-Dcronjob] [-Dtenant]. Use -Dcronjob to pass a CronJob code, such as -Dcronjob=MyCronJob. Use quotation marks for CronJob codes with spaces, such as -Dcronjob="My Cron Job".

target.name: clearAdministrationLock
target.description: Clears any administration lock, which can be left after unfinsihed system update or initialization. This will work only for cluster node which acquired such a lock.

target.name: startHybrisServer
target.description: Starts the hybris Server

target.name: startAdminServer
target.description: Starts the hybris AdminServer

target.name: executesql
target.description: Executes raw sql using the current platform database settings. You must provide a ${sql.file} property!

target.name: updateSpringXsd
target.description: Converts spring xsd definitions to versionless.

target.name: distWithSources
target.description: Creates distribution and source packages.

target.name: deployDist
target.description: Deploys a distribution package to maven repository.

target.name: deployDistWithSources
target.description: Deploys distribution and source packages to maven repository.

target.name: createConfig
target.description: If not present creates config folder using template provided by -Dinput.template variable.
